result.title: Long-term validation and replicability study of the sidestream SMARTechs
result.description: The report will include mass balances and performances about 2 years operation of the sidestream SMARTechs; technological validation according to the ETV pilot program; evaluation of replicability in the other municipal WWTPs included in the SMART-Plant project. The report will even include definitive data supplied within the project for the activities of WP4 and WP5.
